twitch_info.title: I Wanna Ponder - 100% | Full Playthrough (Part 4/9)
twitch_info.description:
59% -> 66%
Played a bit more Tower Defense but primarily puzzles.

but there are no dancing mushrooms in the game

if you tried to place a block in front of the exit, then you would get your money back without spending it

so most likely fixed, but i dont feel like downloading it to check

actually frozen it's a puzzle fangame, with a TD bonus mini game

if you're going for pure dps you can just math it out

but given that information you could just math it through
"the cost/damage mods for towers are of their base 1x, 1x (2x total), 2x (4x total), 2x (6x total), 2x (8x) total, 4x (12x total), 4x (16x total), 4x (20x total), 6x (26x total), 10x (36x) total"

and a lot of good ones too... nowadays the only good TD franchises that remain are bloons and kingdom rush
unfortunately, you can't micro in this game

basically in every other desktop TD game, you could build and sell towers mid-round to change enemy paths on the fly

for what its worth too, the shield doesn't kick in til they take damage so the slow from the first ice will work
oh is it 30% chance to get 75% piercing
piercing shot means the bullet goes through to hit another target
yeah i never really considered that
could call it armor penetration instead
I mean, they're both valid uses of piercing
I thought 100% chance for 75% lower armor is much better than getting 30% for 100% piercing Kappa
kurath i like your actually real title screen
just having a bit more damage on the second row instead of the first is probably enough
How do shields work? When they get hit the first time, they ignore damage for N seconds? Does it come back, or only one shot?
shield comes back after some time
yeah i could look at the numbers but it recharges after a while
cheer1 cheer1 cheer1 cheer1 cheer1 tip: do the thing for the stuff to happen

all the sfx are turned down while in td to try and compensate for it but i really needed to stop them from chain playing over each other
